Keywords: Armor , Latveria , Mystical , Politician , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
THE WORLD SHALL KNOW THE MIGHT OF DR. DOOM!: When Dr. Doom hits, after resolutions generate a Doombot bystander [MAX 3].
YOU WILL FALL BENEATH MY LEGION OF DOOMBOTS!: Dr. Doom modifies his attack and defense by +X where X is equal to the number of his Doombot bystanders on the map. // Dr. Doom gains an additional [BOLT] if 2 or more of his Doombot bystanders are on the map.
FOOLS! THAT WAS NOT THE REAL DOOM!: FREE: KO one of Dr. Doom's Doombot bystanders. If you did, place Dr. Doom in the square they last occupied and heal him a number of clicks equal to the number of his Doombot bystanders on your force.
